document_data.mainbody:
Cymbrils Walk was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Cymbrils Walk was located in the northern section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. The road orignated on the Street of Bells, branching west for several blocks through the Street of the Sword and Warriors Way before turning north to merge with Alnether Street on the Street of Silver across from the eastern end of Keltarn Street. A small alley called the Prowl connected with the northern side of Cymbrils Walk and Elsambuls Lane connected with its eastern side.
